states.name: Recv
enter_hints: In the "Recv" state, the endpoint receives STREAM and STREAM_DATA_BLOCKED frames.
exit_hints: If the stream is in the "Recv" or "Size Known" state, the transport SHOULD signal this by sending a STOP_SENDING frame.
Once all data for the stream has been received, the receiving part enters the "Data Received" state.

states.name: Size Known
enter_hints: The receiving part of the stream then enters the "Size Known" state.
exit_hints: If the stream is in the "Recv" or "Size Known" state, the transport SHOULD signal this by sending a STOP_SENDING frame.

states.name: Data Received
enter_hints: Once all data for the stream has been received, the receiving part enters the "Data Received" state.
